text: Paul Ritter (born Simon Paul Adams; 20 December 1966 – 5 April 2021) was an English stage and screen actor. His film roles included Son of Rambow (2007), Quantum of Solace (2008), Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince (2009), and The Eagle (2011), as well as television programmes including Friday Night Dinner (2011–2020), Vera (2011–2013), No Offence (2015–2018), Cold Feet (2017–2020), Resistance (2019), Chernobyl (2019), and Belgravia (2020). Ritter was born Simon Paul Adams in Gravesend, Kent. He died of a brain tumour in Faversham, Kent at the age of 54 on 5 April 2021. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in England Category:Deaths from brain cancer Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:Actors from Kent
title: Paul Ritter (actor)
